item.title: After-School Activities for Hyperactive Children: Engaging ADHD Kids
item.description: Children with ADHD (Attention-Deficit/Hyperactivity Disorder) face challenges that can make after-school hours particularly difficult. With hyperactivity and attention issues persisting after school, parents often struggle to keep their children engaged in productive and healthy activities. But with the right approach, after-school activities can help channel their energy, improve focus, and even enhance their social skills.
